notesStmt.note: Verse: "I did intend in Rhimes Heroick".
A satire on the conversion of the Earl of Peterborough and others to Roman Catholicism.
In this edition the bracket to the right of the lines ending "Grimace,", "pace" and "grace." in column two is not floriated, and the F in "FINIS" is under the "u" of "return".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
